entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13. POP 60%

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 9.
